trans-unit.source: Get a VPN device configuration script
trans-unit.target: Get a VPN device configuration script

trans-unit.source: Get the configuration script for a VPN device that the local network gateway needs to establish a connection with the virtual network gateway.
trans-unit.target: Get the configuration script for a VPN device that the local network gateway needs to establish a connection with the virtual network gateway.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="e7e51c17-0153-4b26-bc89-ed43d644f843" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to local network gateways.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="e7e51c17-0153-4b26-bc89-ed43d644f843" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to local network gateways.

trans-unit.source: Status code: 200 (OK) if the action is successful; otherwise, 404 (Not Found).
trans-unit.target: Status code: 200 (OK) if the action is successful; otherwise, 404 (Not Found).

trans-unit.source: 400 (Bad Request) can occur if the local network gateway exists but it doesn’t connect to a virtual network gateway.
trans-unit.target: 400 (Bad Request) can occur if the local network gateway exists but it doesn’t connect to a virtual network gateway.

trans-unit.source: The response is the stream of the VPN device configuration script.
trans-unit.target: The response is the stream of the VPN device configuration script.
